name: Pro Auto Filter Bot V2
description: A Filter Bot Which Doesnt Need Manuall Filter Adding

APP_ID.description: Your APP ID From my.telegram.org or @MT_MyTelegramOrg_Bot

API_HASH.description: Your API Hash From my.telegram.org or @MT_MyTelegramOrg_Bot

DB_URI.description: Your Mongo DB URL Obtained From mongodb.com

MT_UPDATE_CHANNEL.description: Your Update Channel (With Out @) Eg:- MO_TECH_GROUP

USER_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram User Session String. Generated From @MT_UserSession_BoT
